properties.areaDesc: Piatt, IL; Sangamon, IL; Menard, IL; Mason, IL; Cass, IL
properties.headline: Hydrologic Outlook issued January 9 at 10:55AM CST by NWS Lincoln IL
properties.description:
This hydrologic outlook includes the following river in Illinois:

Sangamon River...

The following river information is based on future predicted
rainfall. The exact amount, intensity, timing, and location of the
rain that will occur is still uncertain. These outlook stages are
provided to show what may be expected if the forecast precipitation
occurs. Once there is more certainty about the river forecasts, a
flood warning or statement will be issued if the threat materializes.

For the Sangamon River at Monticello...the latest stage is 6.4 feet
at 10 AM Thursday. Flood stage is 13.0 feet. Minor flooding is
forecast...with a crest of 16.5 feet Monday morning...which is 3.5
feet above flood stage. The river should rise above the flood stage
of 13.0 feet Saturday evening.

For the Sangamon River at Riverton...the latest stage is 6.1 feet at
10 AM Thursday. Flood stage is 23.0 feet. Minor flooding is
forecast...with a crest of 23.1 feet Wednesday afternoon...which is
0.1 feet above flood stage. The river should rise above the flood
stage of 23.0 feet Wednesday morning.

For the Sangamon River at Petersburg...the latest stage is 6.9 feet
at 10 AM Thursday. Flood stage is 23.0 feet. Moderate flooding is
forecast...with a crest of 25.0 feet Wednesday evening...which is 2.0
feet above flood stage. The river should rise above the flood stage
of 23.0 feet Monday afternoon. At 25.0 feet...Some residences on the
east side of Petersburg flood.

For the Sangamon River near Oakford...the latest stage is 458.8 feet
at 9 AM Thursday. Flood stage is 471.0 feet. Moderate flooding is
forecast...with a crest of 473.5 feet early Tuesday morning...which
is 2.5 feet above flood stage. The river should rise above the flood
stage of 471.0 feet Sunday morning.

For the Sangamon River near Chandlerville...the latest stage is 446.1
feet at 10 AM Thursday. Flood stage is 456.6 feet. Moderate flooding
is forecast...with a crest of 460.5 feet Tuesday afternoon...which is
3.9 feet above flood stage. The river should rise above the flood
stage of 456.6 feet Sunday morning. At 461.0 feet...Water overtops
the South Sangamon West Levee at the pump station.
